original: 降曹重歸劉備，曹操讚「事君不忘其本，天下義士也。」千里保皇嫂乃至華容道釋曹等，忠義勇武為後世封神。
text: Cao returned to Liu Bei again, and Cao Cao praised that 'everyone does not forget its roots, and righteous men in the world.' Qianli Baohuang's wife and even Huarong Dao Shi Cao, etc., were loyal, righteous and brave as future generations.
